bibl.title: Artemidorus fr. 21 and P. Artemid. col. IV.
bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). "The papyrus is the work of someone who was working from Meineke's edition of Stephanus of Byzantium, the Müller (Didot) edition of the Geographi Graeci Minores, and the Müller (Didot) edition of Strabo."

bibl.title: Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)

bibl.seg: CANFORA Luciano, Artemidorus fr. 21 and P. Artemid. col. IV.

Kai BRODERSEN and Jaś ELSNER (Edd.), Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008) = Historia. Einzelschriften. 214 (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 89-94, 2 tabl.

P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). "The papyrus is the work of someone who was working from Meineke's edition of Stephanus of Byzantium, the Müller (Didot) edition of the Geographi Graeci Minores, and the Müller (Didot) edition of Strabo."
